{"id":1523620728,"question_id":3686,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1738090767,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"289 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1523620728/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Beautiful Splits in an Array","memory":"390.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int beautifulSplits(vector<int>& nums) {//1 <= nums.length <= 5000; 0 <= nums[i] <= 50\n        int n = nums.size();\n        if(n<3)\n            return 0;\n        vector<vector<int>> dp(n+1, vector<int>(n+1, 0));\n        for(int i=n-1; i>=0; i--) {\n            for(int j=i; j<n; j++) {\n                if(nums[i]== nums[j])\n                    dp[i][j] = 1+ dp[i+1][j+1];\n            }\n        }\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<n-2; i++) {\n            for(int j=i+1; j<n-1; j++) {\n                if( (i+1<=j-i && dp[0][i+1]>=i+1) || (j-i<=n-j && dp[i+1][j+1]>=j-i) )\n                    ans++;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-beautiful-splits-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
